links.*: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum

wikitext.*:
'''Nacon''', previously known as '''Bigben Interactive''', is a French video game company, based in Lesquin.In 2022, it acquired [[Daedalic Entertainment]].<ref>{{webcite|articleurl= https://www.pcgamer.com/nacon-acquires-daedalic-entertainment-for-dollar60-million/ | articlename= Nacon acquires Daedalic Entertainment for $60 million |dated = February 16, 2022 |website=[https://www.pcgamer.com/uk/ PC Gamer]| accessed= March 24, 2023}}</ref> In 2023, it published the videogame [[The Lord of the Rings: Gollum]].
